EM-Connectomics¶

TODO: add a summary table

SNEMI3D¶

  1. Description
    1. resolution: 6x6x30 nm
    2. train: 6x6x3 um (AC4 in Kasthuri dataset)
      1. image/train-input.tif, seg/train-labels.tif
    3. test: 6x6x3 um (first 100 slices in AC3 in Kasthuri dataset)
      1. image/test-input.tif
  2. Download
    1. Official website (register first)
    2. Rhoana copy
    3. RC server copy: /n/coxfs01/vcg_connectomics/snemi/
    4. valid: 6x6x4 um (last 156 slices in AC3 in Kasthuri dataset)

CREMI¶

  1. Description
    1. resolution: 4x4x40 nm
    2. train: 5x5x5 um
      1. orig/sample_{A,B,C}_20160501.hdf
    3. test: 5x5x5 um
      1. orig/sample_{A,B,C}+_20160601.hdf
    4. correction:
      1. shift re-alignment all volumes
      2. {A,B,C}: crop the intersecting regions
      3. A+: fix the crack
  2. Download #. Official website #. Rhoana copy (corrected) #. RC server (corrected): /n/coxfs01/vcg_connectomics/cremi/
